Name: Powerful Courses
About the game: Are you looking for a good digital product for your Steam collection? It is difficult to choose a good game among many different ones, and there is simply no time to play them all in a row? You've come to the right place! We want to offer you to spend your time in Steam not only interestingly, but also usefully! With us, you will be able to start researching STREAM/STEAM/STEM education methods (Science, Technology, Reading + Writing, Engineering, Art and Mathematics) in an interesting game form. Add this educational game to your arsenal and feel like a mad scientist. Powerful Courses is an educational program with a game orientation for learning and self-development. Here, courses of various categories are waiting for you, which will help you train your brain and develop. All you need is a computer and a desire to learn to improve your mental abilities and knowledge. It is not just a software system or computer entertainment, it is an evolution of e-learning with tools such as mini-games, puzzles, interesting tasks and tests. Anyone can find something useful here. And fast updates will not let you get bored, because you will constantly receive new content! Each course is a new step for the mind. This is not magic, but the wonders of e-learning. Learning is not boring. Exploring the unknown is always interesting. Make an investment in your future skills. Experience the power of the mind, a new pace of life, power and energy. Let's start training the brain!
